org.openbel.framework.common.xbel.parser
Class XBELValidator

java.lang.Object
  org.openbel.framework.common.xbel.parser.XBELValidator
All Implemented Interfaces:
XMLValidator
public class XBELValidator
extends Object
implements XMLValidator

Implements an XBEL validator.

This is nothing XBEL-specific about this class, apart from its name.

Author:
Anthony Bargnesi <abargnesi@selventa.com>

Constructor Detail

XBELValidator

public XBELValidator()
              throws SAXException
Creates an XBEL validator that processes the document's defined schema to validate against.

Throws:
SAXException - Thrown if an error is found during processing the specified schemas; the current API does not provide SAX error handler functionality

XBELValidator

public XBELValidator(String... schemas)
              throws SAXException
Creates a XBEL validator associated with any number of XML schemas.

Parameters:
schemas - Paths to XML schemas
Throws:
SAXException - Thrown if an error is found during processing the specified schemas; the current API does not provide SAX error handler functionality
InvalidArgument - Thrown if schemas is null or zero-length

XBELValidator

public XBELValidator(File... schemas)
              throws SAXException
Creates a XBEL validator associated with any number of XML schemas.

Parameters:
schemas - XML schema files
Throws:
SAXException - Thrown if an error is found during processing the specified schemas; the current API does not provide SAX error handler functionality
InvalidArgument - Thrown if schemas is null or zero-length

XBELValidator

public XBELValidator(URL... schemas)
              throws SAXException,
                     IOException,
                     URISyntaxException
Creates a XBEL validator associated with any number of XML schemas.

Parameters:
schemas - URLs, the XML schema urls
Throws:
SAXException - thrown if an error is found during processing the specified schemas; the current API does not provide SAX error handler functionality
URISyntaxException - thrown if a URL in schemas has invalid URI syntax
IOException - thrown if an i/o error occurs reading from the schema url's InputStream
InvalidArgument - Thrown if schemas is null or zero-length

XBELValidator

public XBELValidator(Source... schemas)
              throws SAXException
Creates a XBEL validator associated with any number of XML schemas.

Parameters:
schemas - XML schema sources
Throws:
SAXException - Thrown if an error is found during processing the specified schemas; the current API does not provide SAX error handler functionality
InvalidArgument - thrown if
  • schemas is null
  • schemas is a zero-length array
